archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.3.8c: c) cached on the processing device (e.g. while a print job is waiting to be printed by a multi-function device (MFD)) to prevent unauthorised viewing of documents on the hard disk.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
